articles.title: Senior Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of KPA
articles.content:
Senior Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of KPA
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Senior army officials Sunday visited lodgings of the participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Pak Yong Sik and other senior officials of the army visited there and met with fishermen and officials who made labor merits in fishing campaign this year.
					
					 They warmly congratulated the participants on bringing about uncommon fruition of "conspicuous scene of big fish hauls", flying big fish haul flags in the campaign this year.
					
					 They said that Marshal Kim Jong Un visited the fishery bases of the People's Army several times this year, consolidated material and technical foundation and energetically led the work to make the fishing success continuously expanded in all seasons through introduction of advanced fishing method.
					
					 They earnestly called on all the fishermen and officials to make ceaseless innovations in fishing campaign, keeping them abreast with the devoted journey of Kim Jong Un to the front.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of the Korean People's Army visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Sunday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Socialist Constitution Day Marked
articles.content:
Socialist Constitution Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Today the leading newspapers here dedicate editorials to the Socialist Constitution Day of the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung promulgated "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on Dec. 27, Juche 61 (1972), a historic event of signal significance in developing the DPRK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the prolonged road taken by the DPRK since the promulgation of the socialist constitution of Juche is the proud annals in which the most advantageous and promising socialist power centered on the popular masses was built and it has won victory after victory under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in heaven, deeply considerate of the long-cherished desire of the Korean people, took an untrodden path for building socialism of Juche. The socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence characterized with the people-first principle was built on this land thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung who advanced the revolution by believing in the people and rousing them to action.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had made an arduous forced march, holding aloft the banner of Songun, and thus reliably defended Korean-style socialism, the greatest patriotic legacy of Kim Il Sung, and successfully led it to prosperity.
					
					 High mountains and steep passes on this land are associated with the devoted footsteps of Kim Jong Il who visited every nook and corner of the country to defend the destiny of the people and bring the people's happiness.
					
					 In the new century of Juche, Korean-style socialism is demonstrating the ever-victorious might while powerfully displaying its advantages under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon everyone to keep great pride and self-esteem of having the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Constitution and thoroughly apply it to all aspects of social life and thus build the best power and thriving socialist nation of Juche on this land as soon as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Moves under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Moves under Fire 
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Minister of Unification of south Korea Hong Yong Phyo at a seminar made a litany of gibberish that the proposal for reunification by a federal formula, whether it is a low level or high level, could never be accepted for it was advanced by the north.
					 In addition, talking volumes about "huge amount of fund" the south Korean authorities are cunningly stirring up the public opinion, saying that it is hard to say "yes" or "no" as to whether the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang is in violation of the UN "resolution on sanctions against the north."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary says the south Korean authorities who tried hard to make the public believe they respect the June 15 joint declaration finally revealed their sinister intention.
					
					 The paper goes on:
					
					 Hong's reckless remarks are nothing but a denial of the June 15 joint declaration as he openly denied the paragraph 2 which vividly represented the basic spirit of the joint declaration By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 His gibberish clearly shows why the south side didn't admit the DPRK's just proposal at the recently stalled inter-Korean authorities' talks. 
					
					 It is not difficult to guess why Hong blatantly challenged the proposal for reunification by a federal formula. He is prompted by an ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 The true nature of the south Korean authorities finds more vivid expression in their crude moves to put aside the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang as they hinder the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and persist in confrontation with the north.
					
					 It is a cynical ploy to invent an excuse for repudiating the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang that they are building up public opinion that the resumption of tour is in breach of the UN "resolution on sanctions against the north."

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Cooperating with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Cooperating with Japan
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A south Korean organization for movement for peace against war conducted a demonstration and peace action before Chongwadae and the Ministry of Defense on December 24 to denounce the authorities for cooperating with Japan for reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula.
					 The demonstrators said that working negotiations among the military authorities of south Korea, U.S. and Japan took place several times to relax the conditions of Japan's advance into the peninsula.
					
					 They stressed that if even the military agreements are concluded with Japan, the triangular military alliance would be established and there would be big possibility for the peninsula to be abused again under Japan's boots.

articles.title: GIs' Germ Weapons Experiment Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
GIs' Germ Weapons Experiments Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference before the Taejon City Office on Dec. 24 in protest against the results of investigation into the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' experiments on germ weapons.
					 Speakers said that the investigation results made by the joint working group of the south Korean and the U.S. military authorities were issued seven months since the disclosure of the case of the GIs' introduction of anthrax germs that threw the south Korean people into horror.
					
					 But the results meant the U.S. forces would continue to make experiments on anthrax germs in the future, too as they made no mistake, the speakers charged.
					
					 They said that the U.S. forces and the south Korean Defense Ministry lacked the will to investigate the case from the beginning as they were subject to investigation.
					
					 Saying that they could not repress the anger at the stance to justify and conduct the experiments every year, disregarding the south Korean people and making them the target of the experiments, they called for checking the U.S. forces' experiments on germ weapons.
					
					 They called for an immediate halt to the dangerous germ weapons experiments threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula and endangering the south Korean people's lives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "To Protect National Heritage Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 The work, published on October 24, Juche 103 (2014), recalls that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the work for protecting national heritage and made efforts to glorify the time-honored history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation before the whole world in the whole period of their revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It also indicates tasks for preserving the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and further glorifying the history and traditions of the Korean nation by thoroughly carrying out the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on protecting the national heritage.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Moscow on Dec. 21.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Thailand, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Thailand, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Thailand and Nigeria from Dec. 14 to 17 on the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Film shows were held by Thai companies and Korean photo and book exhibitions by the Franoson Mannyon International Company Ltd. and the Hi-tech Machinery Ltd. of Nigeria and a hospital in Zamfara State of Nigeria.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibitions were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were books and photos introducing the achievements made by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Korean films dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il were shown.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Cambodian, Equatorial Guinean Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Cambodian, Equatorial Guinean Personages
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar, remembrance meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show took place at the DPRK embassies in Phnom Penh and Malabo on Dec. 15 and 16 on the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and art pieces depicting them standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was the great hero of Korea and eternal father of the Korean people who turned the DPRK into a country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He noted that noble exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il would be immortal as they devoted all their lives to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and national reunification.
					
					 The director of the secretariat of the general secretary's office of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician and benevolent leader of the people as he dedicated himself to defending the dignity of the country and the sovereignty of the nation and realizing the cause of global independence.
					
					 He also praised Kim Jong Il as an invincible and iron-willed commander who turned the DPRK into a political and military power, nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher with his original Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed by Guinean Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed by Guinean Media
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Media of Guinea carried special write-ups on the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The newspaper Horoya on Dec. 11 allotted one full page to an article titled "4th anniversary of demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 The newspaper said:
					
					 The Korean people have brought great changes in the dynamic advance to carry out his behests in all spheres of society.
					
					 A lot of factories and enterprises have been renovated and big progress made in improving the people's living standard. Miracles and innovations have also been made in building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people in their dynamic advance for translating into a brilliant reality the plan and desire of Kim Jong Il, guided by his behests.
					
					 The Guinean domestic and international radios aired the same reports on Dec. 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Suk was the heroic and indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk bravely fought against the Japanese imperialists after joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 She was the most loyal revolutionary comrade-in-arm of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 She devotedly defended Kim Il Sung in several battles during the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 She gave birth to Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and brought him up to be the successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea, she positively assisted Kim Il Sung in his work for building the party, state and army and played a big role in building the regular army.
					
					 The Korean people are always revering and holding her in high esteem as the mother of Korea as she warmly loved the people and devoted herself to their happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Figure
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was the greatest man who dedicated his all to the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of the cause of human independence.
					 Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, said this in an article posted on a website on Dec. 15.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il was the great man who firmly defended the happiness of the Korean people and the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the war without a gun report against the U.S. and its followers to a victory and turned the DPRK into a military power with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He was the prominent thinker and theoretician who developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He successfully carried forward the cause of the President and thus developed the DPRK into a dignified country and prosperous paradise admired by the world public.
					
					 Indeed, the whole life of Kim Jong Il was the indomitable one in which he planned everything in a big way and pushed forward it in the highest speed and thus brought earlier the future.
					
					 The noble image of Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the rosy future of the country and people will always be kept in the hearts of the progressives.

articles.title: British Organizations Wish Kim Jong Un Fresh Success in His Work
articles.content:
British Organizations Wish Kim Jong Un Fresh Success in His Work
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Dec. 18 to wish supreme leader Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the heroic revolutionary armed forces, fresh success in his noble work.
					 He more firmly turned the DPRK into an impregnable fortress and further bolstered the self-defensive capabilities, the statement said.
					
					 He defused the hair-trigger crisis which might lead to an armed conflict in last August by dint of Songun and thus cleared off the dark clouds of a nuclear war and defended peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world, it noted.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people are building a thriving socialist nation while smashing every move of the U.S. imperialists and their followers against the DPRK by dint of the self-defensive capabilities with the nuclear deterrent as a pivot, it said, adding: We warmly congratulate Kim Jong Un on the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
